short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pushes Lightning payments to your mobile device!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Push LN Extension pairs with Push LN Android App and captures Lightning payment links on the web and forwards to your phone for fast and easy payments.
